abstract: Nokia and Microsoft are taking different approaches to try to compete with Apple’s wildly successful App Store for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
snippet: Nokia and Microsoft are taking different approaches to try to compete with Apple’s wildly successful App Store for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:26 p.m.  Clarification: Nokia’s app store will include 20,000 offerings, which includes short videos and entertainment and media files in addition to applications.

headline.main: The Cellphone Industry’s Field of Dreams
